task.title: Creating a Lifetime Subscription Plan
task.abstract: A Lifetime Subscription Plan, by default, will have a term of 100 years beginning on the purchase date. A Lifetime Subscription Plan cannot be set up for the Auto Renew Option.

step.cmd: Navigate to Subscription Plans in the eStore app and click New.
Enter a Name for the Subscription Plan, set the Type to Lifetime, and check the Is Active checkbox.
Add a Description and click Save.

taskbody.result: A Lifetime Subscription Plan is created.
